Senior ETL AWS Machine Learning Engineer
My client has a full time opening for a Sr Machine Learning Engineer.
You
MUST be Senior Level,
also you must be a Citizen or GC holder to qualify for this role. The ideal candidate will have recent experience with
Snowflake sitting on AWS Services
!!
Skills Needed To Succeed
Deployment of Data Models
Work closely to support the Data Science team
SQL
Python
Spark
Snowflake
Linux
ETL
Automation
Data mining
AWS
Azure
Data Modeling
Data Warehousing
If you have these skills, then this opportunity could be for you. Please contact me directly via phone or email. If not, don't rule yourself out quite yet because I have multiple openings that may be an even better fit for you.
